lines: bhaagy dekho veena ka
rishte kitane aae the
kaheen na kaheen dosh nikaal detee thee
sapanon ke jis raajakumaar kee kalpana karatee aaee thee vah yauvan kee dahaleej par pahunch kar bhee kaheen door bhee nahin dikhaee deta tha
mool roop se ve himaachal pradesh ke the
vaheen se rishte aate the
pannaalaalanirmala ne milakar apanee sabase badee aakaanksha ko saakaar kiya tha apane sab bachchon ko achchhee shiksha dilavaee thee
aur isee ke parinaam svaroop unakee jaanakaaree mein jo bhee ladaka achchha padhalikh jaata tha usaka rishta ek baar chalakar jaroor aata tha
koee maang nahin rakhata tha bas sushikshitasanskaaree ladakee kee kaamana karata tha
aur aise mein jojo bahan badee
hotee ja rahee thee usaka rishta svayan chalakar aa raha tha
suneeta kee shaadee aise hee huee
rajanee ka rishta bhee aise hee hua tha
veena nahin maanatee thee aise mein to maanpita yahee samajhate ki abhee usaka lagan dheela hai
jab sanyog honge to chatapat sab kuchh ho jaega
aaj dekho sanyog jage to rishta bhee ho gaya shaadee bhee ho gaee
aur shaadee ke baad saamane garajate kaale baadalon ka ambaar lag gaya hai
jorajor se baadal garaj rahe hain
bijalee kadak rahee hai

na jaane kab baarish ho jae baarish kitanee hogee toophaan aaega kaisee barabaadee laega abhee kuchh nahin pata abhee to veena ko yaad aa rahe hain ve chehare jo kitanee aas lagae usase shaadee ko betaab the
ek tha ratanalaal doktar ratanalaal
himaachal mein kulloo kshetr ka rahane vaala
sushikshit parivaar ka ladaka
doktaree kee padhaee ke baad vaheen sarakaaree aspataal mein naukaree lag gaee thee usakee
usake rishte kee baat shuroo huee to kisee ne bataaya veena ka
apanee maan ke saath vah chalakar deharaadoon aaya
veena ko dekh kar vah mohit ho gaya
aur udhar pannaalaal ne nirmala se vichaaravimarsh kiya
sarasaree taur par veena se poochha aur abhee vah kuchh sochatee ya kahatee kah diya  are isase achchha aur kya milega meree betee ka bhaagy bahut achchha hai  aur theek hai na betee
kahakar bina use tatole bheetar jaakar haan kar dee
ratanalaal kee maan ne nirmala ko munh meetha karavaane ko kah diya
chand minaton mein ratanalaal ghar ka jamaee ghoshit kar diya gaya
aise mein chuhalabaajee karate hue veena ko rajanee ne majaak mein kah diya kaisa bauna lagata hai veena golamatol chalata hai to lagata hai ludhak raha hai
aur veena ne tab gaur se dekha ratanalaal ko
are ye kya doktar ke roop mein use vah nahin dikha use
usake mastishk ne ab man mein base darpan ne usakee tasveer kheenchee aur apanee kaalpanik tasveer se usaka mel kiya
yah to manadarpan mein racheebasee chhavi se bilkul vipareet thee
ab kya karoon kaise mana karoon rajanee se kaha
rajanee ne maan se baat kee aur maan ne pannaalaal se
ab mana kaise kar sakate hain jubaan kar dee hai
munh bhee meetha karava diya hai
mana karenge to saaree biraadaree thoothoo karegee
aage kaun rishta dega dherasee shankaen umad aaeen pannaalaal ke man mein
lekin betee ke man ko bhee nahin todana chaahate the
jorajabaradastee kabhee nahin kee thee unhonne apane bachchon par
aise mein bas ekaant mein baith kar unhonne bahut socha phir ek chhoteesee chitthee ratanalaal kee maan ke naam daak mein daal aae
apanee ladakee kee ichchha ke viruddh vah nahin ja sakate yahee bhar likh diya
chhotaasa pradesh hai himaachal palabhar mein khabar saaree rishtedaaree mein phail gaee
sabhee naaraaz ho gae
veena kee naanee rooth gaee apanee betee se maama bhee usake rooth gae
lekin pannaalaal ne jo nirnay suna diya tha vah usase nahin badale
veena ko kabhee lagata ki usane na karake shaayad galatee kee hai
rishtedaaron kee baaten sunee
lekin man mein banee chhavi kee hee jeet huee usee ne dilaasa diya agar veena tumhaaree baat anuchit hotee to ve tumako jaroor kahate
pyaar se bhee gusse se bhee
rishtedaaron kee nahin maan rahe hain
yadi main vaastav mein koee bhool kar rahee hotee to kya ye mera saath dete
vakt nikalata gaya
himaachal se ab usake lie rishta aana mumakin na tha
aise mein akhabaar mein se vigyaapan chhantane shuroo hue aur veena svayan hee talaashane lagee apana var
dev ka milana usake bhaagy mein tha
yah milan saat janmon ke rishte se juda hai ya phir yah saat janmon ke baad kee naee daastaan hai

manadarpan mein basee chhavi to mil gaee lekin us chhavi ke peechhe parade mein kitanee kahaaniyaan hain kitanee sachchaeeyaan hain kitane gahare raaz chhipe hain  ekaek man jab dar jaata hai to anaginat agyaat aashankaen use gher letee hain
dherasee kalpanaen usane kar daaleen pal bhar kee mulaakaat ke baad veena kee dasha to usase bhee kharaab thee
use samajh nahin aa raha tha ki vah kya kare
dev ne use dhokha diya hai
usake ghar vaalon ne itanee badee baat chhipaakar shaadee kee hai usakee
kaun doshee hai kaun
ghar vaale doshee hain ramesh doshee hai to dev bhee to doshee hai
mujhe ghar vaalon se kya lena dev se shaadee kee hai
dosh to usaka hee hai mere prati
aise dhokhebaaj ke saath jindagee kaise beetegee
jeevan bhar

kainsar ke mareej se byaahee dulhan ka suhaag kab tak bana rahega kab tak vah to kah raha hai usakee beemaaree jad se chalee gaee kyonki usake shareer ka vah bhaag hee kaat kar phenk diya gaya hai jo kharaab ho gaya tha
aise vyakti ke saath phir bhee kaise gujaara hoga
use chhod doon do took kah doon tumane mujhe dhokha diya hai
dhokhe se kee gaee shaadee shaadee nahin kahala sakatee
chhodakar sab kuchh subah hee deharaadoon chalee jaoon aur ise ek bhoolee kahaanee samajh loon
lekin
lekin mammeedaidee chhotee bahanembhaee naaterishtedaaron ko kya bataoongee
mammeedaidee kee kya dasha hogee
dherase prashn uth rahe the usake man mein
svayan ko duvidha mein pa rahee thee
kuchh aur nahin soch sakee vah
saamane boodhe maanbaap khade dikhaee die
kitanee khushee se unhonne vida kiya tha use unake sab sapane ekaek tod kar kya vah khush rah paegee aur tabhee bijalee kee tarah man mein ek nirnay kaundh gaya veena ke
ghar jaakar bhee rahoongee jaise yaheen isee ke saath rah loon
jaisa bhee hai pasand se varan kiya hai usaka
jo hona hai use hee hone doon
bhaagy kee baat thee tabhee isase vivaah hua hai
ab apanee jindagee bhaagy ke sahaare hee chhod doon
jo banaegaabigaadega vah bhaagy hee karega
bas aur kuchh nahin subah veena kee aankh jaldee khul gaeen
dev tab so raha tha
vah chupachaap uthakar khidakee ke paas baith gaee
saamane kee sadak par ikkaadukka log aa ja rahe the
subah kee sair ko nikale hue log
usaka bhee man hua ki vah uthe aur taiyaar hokar ghar se baahar nikal jae
subah kee hava se usaka man bhee taaja ho jaega
lekin sankoch usake aade aa gaya
vah vaheen baithee rah gaee
khulee khidakee se halkee hava aa rahee thee
usee ka aanand lene lagee
lekin vah thandee hava usako aatmavibhor nahin kar sakee
man dherasee
aashankaon se sahamasa gaya tha
kuchh sochane samajhane kee shakti bhee nahin rahee thee usamen
bas raharah kar so rahe pati ko dekh letee thee
kitana sundar tha vah
haan dev bahut sundar tha
lekin usake bheetar kee kahaanee ne veena ko kampa diya tha
romarom sihar utha usaka
usakee sundarata par mohit ho gaee thee vah
vah gyaanee bhee tha usake man par bhee vah mohit ho gaee thee
lekin is vyakti ke lie sanjoe sapane vah tootate nahin dekh paane kee kshamata rakhatee thee isaka bhee ehasaas use tha
jo kuchh bhee bataaya dev ne apane vishay mein vah usake vipareet kuchh nahin soch pa rahee thee
use dev ka sab bataaya sahaj vishvaas karane yogy nahin lag raha tha kyonki dev bhalaachanga tandurust usake
saamane soya pada tha
dev ko dekhakar koee kalpana bhee nahin kar sakata tha ki vah kabhee apane jeevan mein ek mahaayuddh lad chuka hai
aur phir sabase bada dhaadhas to use usaka man bandha raha tha ki dev aaj tandurust hai
use bhavishy mein koee takaleeph hogee to vah usake bhaagy mein likhee hogee
bhaagy ko bhala kaun badal sakata hai yah dhaarana usake bheetar baithe hue sanskaaron ke kaaran bhee janm le rahee thee
jo kuchh usake saath pahale se ho chuka hai vah shaadee ke baad bhee to ho sakata tha
tab vah kya usaka saath chhod sakatee vartamaan mein jaldabaajee karana uchit nahin
jaldee mein uthaaya gaya kadam galat bhee ho sakata hai
dev ke saath parinayasootr mein bandhana usakee niyati mein likha tha usee bhaav mein ab vah jeena seekhegee
dev ke chehare ko dekhakar vah ekaek sanyamit ho gaee
tabhee veena ke vichaaron kee shrrnkhala toot gaee
dev uth chuka tha
dev kee or dekhakar veena ne muskuraane kee cheshta kee
kab utheen  dev ne dheeme se poochha
shabd sabhee bikhare hue dekh raha tha dev apane
chaah kar bhee vah usakee or apanee baanhen nahin badha paaya
abhee bas thodee der pahale
nahin bata sakee vah use ki neend to usake paas nahin phatakee
shareer jo saumpa tha usane raat dev ko aur jo kuchh bhee mahasoos kiya suna samajha aur dekha vah sab usake sabhee sapanon ko jhakajhor gaya
vah apane sanjoe sabhee svapnon ke saath jis aakaash mein ud rahee thee ve sabhee use bikharate dikhe the us paladopal kee madahoshee ke baad
vah jo dev ko paane ko betaab thee vah veena ab nahin rahee thee
ab chaahakar bhee dev kee or nahin badh pa rahee thee
kya soch rahee ho  dev ne dabe svar mein poochha
vah bhee svayan ko bebasapa raha tha isase adhik kuchh nahin kah paaya
kuchh nahin bas yoon hee bikhareshabd chun rahee hoon
na koee vaaky ban raha hai na kuchh
baat adhooree hee rah gaee
aansoo na rok paee vah

sisakane lagee dev ko is baat ka ehasaas to tha ki vah abhee aisa kuchh karane yogy nahin hai ki jisase veena raat ke pahale chand kshanon mein use jaisee lag rahee thee saralata se vaisee dikhane lagegee
samajhadaar to tha lekil usake man kee thaah nahin le pa raha tha
phir bola  main abhee nahaakar sabase pahale ramesh bhaee se baat karoonga unhonne aisa kaise kar diya
usase kya hoga is baat ko abhee tool mat deejie
main abhee anishchitata ke daur se guzar rahee hoon
jaldabaajee mein main kuchh aisa nahin karana chaahatee ki jisase mere parivaar vaalon ko duhkh pahunche
mujhe apanee bhaavanaon ke pravaah ko rokana hai
jo ho chuka hai use ekaek main badalana nahin chaah rahee
veena ka nishchay abhee svayan use hee samajh nahin aa raha tha tab vah dev ko kya bataatee
lekin usake shabdon ne jaise dev ko taakat dee
use laga use veena ke manobhaavon ko jeetana hoga
use bhaavanaon ke pravaah mein ultee or jaane se rokana hoga
ek hee shabd sunakar vah samajh gaya ki veena bhaavuk ladakee hai
narm dil kee hai
use bhaavanaon mein baandh kar rakha ja sakata hai
vah usake saath banee rahegee yadi vah usakee bhaavanaon ka sambal ban kar rah saka to
bhaavuk praanee bah jaata hai bhaavanaon mein bahut jaldee
dev ko laga ab raasta use dhoondhana hai
byaahata hai vah usakee
use apanee premil bhaavanaon mein baandh kar rakhane kee vah yathaayogy cheshta karega
usee pravaah mein vah bola  main tumhaara gunaahagaar hoon veena jo chaahatee ho jaisa chaahatee ho vahee hoga aaj se
bas ek baar mujhase kah dena
main uph tak nahin karoonga
mainne jaaneanajaane tumhaara dil duhkhaaya hai
jo saza dogee main chupachaap sah loonga
dev kee baat veena ke man mein aa basee
bhaavuk ladakee thee vah bolee  jaisa socha tha mainne vaisa tumhaara roop paaya
svayan hee mainne tumhaara varan kiya
jo nahin jaanatee thee ya main jisase anjaan thee vah mere saath dhokhe mein hua ya mere bhaagy se
abhee kuchh nahin kah sakatee
bas itanee ichchha hai meree ki main kuchh aisa na kar baithoon jisase mere parivaar ke kisee bhee sadasy ko thes pahunche
isalie abhee meree vinatee hai ki aaj jo kuchh meretumhaare beech hua hai usakee parachhaee bhee is kamare se baahar na pahunche
yahee vaayada chaahie mujhako
veena ke shabd aansuon kee aviral dhaara ke saath nikal rahe the
bhaavuk hee nahin samajhadaar bhee hai dev ne socha man mein
palabhar mein man apane saamane anuroop banatee paristhiti ke saath kitanee sheeghrata se sanyamit ho jaata hai yah is samay dev kee manahsthiti ko dekhakar samajha ja sakata tha
mere man mein tumhaare prati prem nahin aadar bhee aa gaya hai
jeevan mein abhee tak sahe sab kasht jaise mit gae hain
mujhe tumase kuchh nahin chaahie
bas main tumhaare lie har dam taiyaar hoon
jo chaahogee jaisa chaahogee vaisa hee hoga
mujhe tumhaare nirnay kee prateeksha rahegee
jo hua hai vah yadi bhaagy mein likha tha to jo hoga vah bhee bhaagy ke anuroop hee hoga
dev veena ko chhoo na saka
haan ghutane tek kar usake saamane baith gaya
aur veena bhee bas us ke kandhon ko chhoo kar bolee  chalie ab taiyaar ho jaate hain
baahar se koee aavaaz laga dega
raat laga tha bahut bada toophaan aaega
lekin yah toophaan aaya bhee jorajor kee garjana karata raha aur phir ekaek tham gaya
kuchh tahasanahas nahin hua
haan veena kee bhaavanaon kee khabar jaroor dev ne man ke har kone mein bitha lee
vah veena ke man ko jeetane ke lie betaab ho utha tha
aur veena ne svayan ko haalaat ke sahaare chhod diya
vah ek nae parivesh ke lie svayan ko taiyaar karana chaahatee thee
apane is vivaahit jeevan ka har nirnay vah apanee sochasamajh ke anuroop lena chaahatee thee
vah apanee khushiyaan baantane vaalee veena thee apane aansoo svayan peena chaahatee thee
